text: Backlog z Mikkeller Beer Celebration Copenhagen 2017. Pyszne. Sporo skojarzeń z mocno słodkim Porto.
MBCC. Hazy red with a white head. Aroma is sweet, honey, cherries, apples and tart. Flavor is quite sweet and rather acidic. Dry and rather acidic finish. 130517
Sample @ MBCC 2017, Green session. Light reddish pour with a fizzy head. Notes of tart cherries, some vanilla, lime, sparkling rose and some light funk.
[5/13/17] Draught at Mikkeller Beer Celebration Copenhagen 2017. Green session. Deep red. Apple, lots of berries, wine, wood, caramel, cookies, sweet, slightly tart, citrus, juicy, rounded. Great.
Sample at MBCC 2017. Fruity and tart smell with red berries. Similar taste with some wine. Sweet. Fresh fruit aroma. Nice.
Mbcc green. Deep reddy clear candy col. Red berries on nose, light barrel on nose. Med bodied, super intense, sparkly, dryish tannic finish. Flavourful, berriyish, nice.

duft: frugt vinøs sød kant
smag citrus frisk rød frugt kant hindbær mandel mel kirsebær
Sampled at Mikkeller Beer Celebration Copenhagen 2017. Clear ruby pour with a thin white head. Notes of citrus, berries, apple skin, light tartness.
Keg at cbc17 Green... Soft red... Thin white lacing.. Soft light fruut nose. soft herbal sweet fruits.. Something odd.. I cant quite place
Tap @MBCC2917, Green Session. Clear copper, small ring of bubbles. Light cherry aroma, honey of course. Apple and cherry flavour. Wine and wood notes. Sweet, sticky.

Sampled @ Mikkeller Beer Celebration 2017, Green Session. Fast klare orange goldene Farbe. Geruch ist süß fruchtig, Honig, rote Beeren, alkoholisch. Geschmack ist süß fruchtig, Honig, Trauben, Holz. Top.
Tap at mbcc17, copenhagen. Red color, some white bubbles on head. Aroma has cherries, berries, some red wine notes. Very fresh and tasty, berries, cherries, pure.
Draft - Sweet barrel and red vinous notes. Deep clear pink with a white head. Vinous red barrel notes and apple.

Tap mbcc, green session. 
Light red color. 
Honey, red berries, some floral notes. Berry even some tartness.
Tap at MBCC2017, Copenhagen. Color is clear red with small white head. Aromas and flavors: Sweetness, berries and sugar. Too sweet.
Reddish color. Apples, grapes, light tartness. Slight bit of tannins. Very good.
Mostly mealy appley smell. Taste is heavily tannic from the cabernet with tart juicy cherries and apple juice. Light carbonation and light body.
